medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient is a 44-year-old man diagnosed with HIV in 1986, presenting with untreated HIV infection and a history of hepatitis C.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was diagnosed with HIV in 1986 and HCV in 2004. Despite being untreated for 20 years, he has normal CD4 counts and undetectable HIV RNA levels.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV infection diagnosed in 1986; HCV infection diagnosed in 2004; significant liver biopsy findings in 2007; received combination therapy for HCV from 2008 to 2008.
medical_history.social_history: Risk factors included injection drug use and unprotected heterosexual intercourse.
